Hi 👋, I am Hamza

Biomedical Engineering PhD Student 🎓 specializing in Neuro-AI 🤖🧠. I study dynamical biological and artificial systems with a focus on vision and decision-making.

Currently working with Dr. Karim Jerbi at the Cognitive and Computational Neuroscience Lab and affiliated with Mila and the Faculty of Medicine at Université de Montréal.

I am a strong proponent of open science 👨🏻‍💻 and aim to impact the community by focusing on Ethics & EDI 🌍, science accessibility 🔬, and raising awareness about AI’s potential harms ⚠️.

Originally from Sfax, Tunisia 🇹🇳, now based in Tiohtià:ke / Montréal, Canada 🇨🇦. Pronouns: he/him.
